name: Poker Quest
description:
Poker Quest is a fantasy rogue-lite where all your power comes from a deck of playing cards - Ace, King, Queen, and so on. The cards you are dealt are used to empower your equipment which enables you to defeat enemies and earn chips to purchase new equipment, consumables, upgrades, and more. Each character comes with their own set of equipment and unique abilities that encourage different play styles.

Features

  • A deck of 52 cards
  • Permanent death
  • Random map each game
  • Epic world length (6)
  • Hundreds of monsters and items
  • 9 unique heroes
